resources.string:
Welcome to Part-timer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Home:

 Home page shows the check in and check out times when the user enters and exits the location. The user has the previlege to edit and add log times. Total number of hours worked on that week and total estimated pay will be show in the home page. 

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Stats: 

 Stats page show the circular progress bar that shows hours completed in that weeek. Bar char displays the daily hours worked in the current weeek. The user can switch to monthly stats which sho the total number of hours worked in that month.


 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

 Settings:

 In the settings page user can add the work location. THe user can also switch between 24 hours and 12 hours time format. The user can enter the pay amount per hour which is shown as estimated pay in the home page. The user can contact us by clicking on the mail icon which redirects the user to mail application.
